entry.name: Profiles screen
entry.field: Please select one of the following psychic readers, in order to begin a live internet chat reading.

entry.name: Login screen
entry.field: Please enter your email address and password, and press "login to existing account". If you can't remember your password, enter your email address only and press "forgot password".
If you don't have an account, please enter your email address, and a password of your choice, and press "create account".

entry.name: Price points screen
entry.field: In order to make a payment, you will be taken to Paypal's secure payment gateway. Please be patient, since these pages can take a long time to load.
You do not currently have any credit. You must purchase at least ${minimumBalance} in order to continue.

You currently have a credit balance of ${currentBalance}. The minimum credit required for this service is ${minimumBalance}.

entry.field: Here you can see your recent payments. For more information, or for information about older payments which are not shown here, please contact customer services.

entry.name: General information section
entry.field: Press this button to see the terms and conditions, which you agreed to when you first signed up to this service.

entry.name: Change password section
entry.field: Please use this form if you wish to change your password. You will need to enter your current password, or security, and the new password.
Remember, you can always request a new password to be sent by email, if you are not able to remember it.

entry.name: Confirm payment screen
entry.field: We now have all the necessary details to process your payment. Please review all of the information and then press the "confirm payment" button below.

entry.name: Details screen
entry.field: We have just a few personal questions to ask you before you begin your online reading. This helps us form a stronger connection and give a more detailed reading.

entry.name: Customer create success alert
entry.field: You have successfully created an account.

entry.name: Customer create email already exists alert
entry.field: We already have an account for a customer with that email address. Please log in with an existing password, or use the'forgot password' option to create a new one.

entry.name: Customer create email invalid alert
entry.field: The email address entered is not valid. Please enter a valid email address and try again.

entry.name: Customer create password invalid alert
entry.field: The password entered is too short. Please enter a longer password and try again.

entry.name: Login email invalid alert
entry.field: Sorry, but we have no customer registered with that email address. Please try again, or contact customer services for "assistance.

entry.name: Login password invalid alert
entry.field: Sorry, but that password does not match our records. Please try again, or select 'forgot password' if you want us to email you a new one. Alternatively, please contact customer services for assistance.

entry.name: Forgot password success alert
entry.field: Your new password has been sent by email. Please check your email and log in using the new details. Please make sure you check in 'spam', if the email doesn't arrive. Please contact customer services if you are still having difficulty.

entry.name: Forgot password email invalid alert
entry.field: Sorry, but we have no customer registered with that email address. Please try again, or contact customer services for assistance.

entry.name: Change password success alert
entry.field: Thank you, we have now updated your account with the new password specified.

entry.name: Change password invalid alert
entry.field: Sorry, but the current password you entered does not match our records. Please try again, or contact customer services for assistance.

entry.name: Unknown error alert
entry.field: Sorry, an unknown error occurred. Please try again, or contact customer services for assistance.

entry.name: Customer details section
entry.field: Here are the personal details we have on file for you.
